page.title: 13POPULATION 1
page.content:
During our visit to Dodworth we conducted a small survey.This consisted of asking 11 people the same 9 questions. THE QUESTIONS WE ASKED. ----------------------- 1.How long have you lived in Dodworth? 2.Do you like living in Dodworth? 3.Do you shop in Dodworth? 4.Do you think there are enough shops in Dodworth? 5.How often do you visit Barnsley? 6.How do you get to Barnsley? 7.Do you go out in the evenings? 8.If so,where do you go? 9.What is your occupation?
The answers are given on Page 14.
